main event: A civilian observed a flashing light in the southeastern sky that remained stationary for over two hours before ascending vertically.
interesting points: The object emitted flashing lights alternating in red, white, and green,The observation lasted for approximately 2 hours,The object was noted to have very slow movement and appeared stationary for most of the time,Witnesses included police officers who confirmed the sighting and reported it to the Air Force,The object was later concluded to resemble the star Sirius, which led to some debate about what was seen.
sighted object: a flashing light in the sky
witness description: police officers who reported the sighting and other local residents
